approval_data.project_summary: A simple web application to manage a list of tasks.
approval_data.business_context: This project provides a basic task management solution.
success_criteria: Users can successfully view their task list.
functional_requirements: A user can create a new task with a text description.
A user can see a list of all created tasks.

raw_analysis.project_summary: A simple web application to manage a list of tasks.
project_goals: Allow a user to add a task
Allow a user to see their list of tasks
target_audience: Users who want to manage a list of tasks
raw_analysis.business_context: This project provides a basic task management solution.

requirements.description: A user can create a new task with a text description.
A user can see a list of all created tasks.

A user can see a list of all created tasks.
success_criteria: Users can successfully view their task list.

recommendations: Add more details to the non-functional requirements.

identified_gaps: Lack of details on security implementation.
Lack of details on performance metrics.
